choose.when: AND EXISTS (SELECT 'Y' FROM TB_USER B WHERE B.USER_ID = A.CNSR_ID AND B.CNTR_CD = A.CNTR_CD AND B.TEAM_CD = #{team2_cd})
AND EXISTS (SELECT 'Y' FROM TB_USER B , TB_CONS_TEAM C WHERE B.USER_ID = A.CNSR_ID AND B.CNTR_CD = A.CNTR_CD AND B.TEAM_CD = C.TEAM_CD AND B.CNTR_CD = C.CNTR_CD AND C.HGRN_TEAM_CD = #{team1_cd})

choose.otherwise: AND RECRNC_DT || RECRNC_HRMN BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + (#{left_tm} * (1/24/60)), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI')

mapper.select: SELECT /* RecrncResrDtlMap.getRecrncResrDtlCount */ COUNT(*) FROM TB_RECRNC_RESR_DTL A
mapper.insert: INSERT /* RecrncResrDtlMap.insertRecrncResrDtl */ INTO TB_RECRNC_RESR_DTL (CONSNO, RECRNC_CNTC_TLNO, RECRNC_DT, RECRNC_HRMN, RECRNC_STAT_CD , CNSR_ID, SIDO_TMCNT, BZPT_DIV , CNTR_CD, RGSR_ID, RGSN_DTTM, AMND_ID, AMNT_DTTM) VALUES (#{consno}, REPLACE(#{recrnc_cntc_tlno}, '-', ''), REPLACE(#{recrnc_dt}, '-', ''), REPLACE(#{recrnc_hrmn}, ':', ''), '10' , #{rgsr_id}, 0, #{bzpt_div} , #{cntr_cd}, #{rgsr_id}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{amnd_id}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'))
